00050 typedef struct {
00051     struct list_head list; 
00052     uint8_t *buffer; 
00053     size_t buffer_size; 
00054     size_t data_size; 
00056     uint32_t issue_timeout; 
00058     uint32_t response_timeout;

00065     unsigned long jiffies_sent; 
00067     uint8_t *file_name; 
00068     uint32_t result; 
00069     uint32_t error_code;
